PR Description: NAATOS TB V1 must not cause skin temperature above 60 °C after five seconds of contact to any surface.
SR Description: The PM shall not have any areas accessible by a user's finger (defined as sphere of 1 cm diameter) with temperatures above 60 °C
The PM shall not exceed a configurable max temperature in heating zones
The SPM shall not have any areas accessible by a user's finger (defined as sphere of 1 cm diameter) with temperatures above 60 °C

PR Description: NAATOS TB V1 must reduce the risk of transmission of infectious agent of TB from potentially infectious sample to operator.
SR Description: The SCC shall be sterile packaged
The SPM shall not melt the tube
The SPM shall fit a specified Tube (SPC) in a tube holder
While "system-run-shake" sub-state is active, the SPM shall not allow the tube to lose its fit in the tube holder
